init.title: Rebooter Pro Options
init.description: Configure automatic reboot behavior and optional push notifications.

data_description.ar_off_duration_seconds: Time the relay stays OFF during any reboot (10–65535).
data_description.ar_power_fail: If enabled, the device will reboot connected equipment after power is restored.
data_description.ar_ping_fail: If enabled, the device will reboot on network outage based on the trigger time.
data_description.ar_trigger_minutes: Must be continuously offline for this long before rebooting (2–10).
data_description.ar_post_reboot_delay_minutes: Delay before ping checks resume after power returns (0–10).
data_description.ar_any_fail: Enabled: reboot when any target fails. Disabled: all targets must fail.
data_description.ar_max_reboots: If pings never recover, reboot at most this many times.
data_description.notify_enabled: Home Assistant will send a notification when state changes.
